A2 an unusual, exciting, and possibly dangerous activity, such as a trip or experience, or the excitement produced by such an activity: go on an adventure They went on an adventure hunting for treasure in the western hills. have an adventure She had some exciting adventures in Egypt.sense of adventure Sam won't come - he's got no sense of adventure (= he does not enjoy dangerous or exciting situations). We got lost on the Metro - it was quite an adventure. Synonym
